fields.title: Sunshine Smoothie Summer Splash
fields.target_audience: Health-conscious families with kids (25-40) who love outdoor activities, beach days, and creating joyful memories together in the sunshine.
fields.campaign_message: Blend Joy Into Every Day - Sunshine in a bottle for your family's brightest moments
fields.description: Vibrant campaign for healthy family smoothies. Emphasizes joy, sunshine, outdoor fun, and bringing families together with delicious, nutritious drinks.

fields.title: Rainbow Kids Art Studio
fields.target_audience: Creative parents and grandparents (30-55) looking for fun, mess-free art activities that spark imagination and bring smiles to children's faces.
fields.campaign_message: Paint Your World with Wonder - Where creativity meets endless giggles and colorful memories
fields.description: Cheerful campaign for children's art supplies. Focus on creativity, imagination, bright colors, and the pure joy of artistic expression.

fields.title: Golden Hour Outdoor Adventure Gear
fields.target_audience: Adventure-loving millennials (22-35) who chase sunsets, love hiking, camping, and sharing their outdoor experiences on social media.
fields.campaign_message: Chase Every Golden Hour - Gear that shines as bright as your adventures
fields.description: Uplifting campaign for outdoor adventure gear. Emphasizes golden hour photography, breathtaking sunsets, and the joy of outdoor exploration.

fields.title: Happy Paws Pet Paradise
fields.target_audience: Devoted pet parents (25-50) who spoil their furry family members and love sharing cute pet moments that make everyone smile.
fields.campaign_message: Unleash Pure Happiness - Because every tail wag deserves to be celebrated
fields.description: Heartwarming campaign for premium pet products. Focus on the unconditional love between pets and owners, playful moments, and pure happiness.

fields.title: Bloom & Glow Garden Party Collection
fields.target_audience: Social hostesses and garden enthusiasts (28-45) who love bringing people together for memorable outdoor celebrations filled with laughter and beauty.
fields.campaign_message: Let Your Garden Party Shine - Where beautiful moments bloom and friendships glow
fields.description: Elegant yet joyful campaign for garden party decorations. Emphasizes magical outdoor gatherings, warm friendships, and creating enchanting moments.
